panels.description: **go_info** â€“ Provides information about the runtime, like version. Its a gauge.
panels.title: Go version

panels.description: **process_cpu_seconds_total** Total user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: CPU seconds total

panels.description:
**process_open_fds** Number of open file descriptors.

**process_max_fds** Maximum number of open file descriptors.
panels.title: Open FDs VS Limit

panels.description: **process_virtual_memory_bytes**  Virtual memory size in bytes.
panels.title: Memory virtual

panels.description: **process_resident_memory_bytes** Resident memory size in bytes.
panels.title: Memory RSS

panels.description: **go_threads** â€“ Number of OS threads created.
panels.title: Thread count

panels.description: **go_goroutines** - Number of goroutines that currently exist.
panels.title: Goroutines count

panels.description: **go_memstats_last_gc_time_seconds** â€“ Number of seconds since 1970 of last garbage collection.
panels.title: Last GC time

panels.description: **go_memstats_next_gc_bytes** â€“ Number of heap bytes when next garbage collection will take place.
panels.title: Next GC heap target

panels.description: **go_gc_duration_seconds** â€“ A summary of the pause duration of garbage collection cycles.
panels.title: GC pauses (quantiles)

panels.description: **go_memstats_last_gc_cpu_fraction** â€“ The fraction of this program's available CPU time used by the GC since the program started.
panels.title: CPU fraction

panels.description:
**go_memstats_sys_bytes** - Number of heap bytes obtained from system. It sums all the sys metrics:

**go_memstats_heap_sys_bytes** â€“ Number of heap bytes obtained from system.

**go_memstats_stack_sys_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes obtained from system for stack allocator.

**go_memstats_mspan_sys_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes used for mspan structures obtained from system.

**go_memstats_mcache_sys_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes used for mcache structures obtained from system.

**go_memstats_buck_hash_sys_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes used by the profiling bucket hash table.

**go_memstats_gc_sys_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes used for garbage collection system metadata.

**go_memstats_other_sys_bytes** Number of bytes used for other system allocations.
panels.title: Memory distribution

panels.description: **go_memstats_alloc_bytes** - Number of bytes allocated and still in use.
panels.title: Allocated bytes at heap in use

panels.description: **go_memstats_heap_objects** â€“ Number of allocated objects.
panels.title: Heap live objects count

panels.description: **go_memstats_mallocs_total** â€“ Total number of mallocs.
panels.title: Allocations per second

panels.description: **go_memstats_lookups_total** â€“ Total number of pointer lookups.
panels.title: Lookups/dereferences per second

panels.description: **go_memstats_frees_total** â€“ Total number of frees.
panels.title: Memory frees per second

panels.description: **go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total** - Total number of bytes allocated, even if freed.
panels.title: Allocated bytes total (even if freed) per second

panels.description: **go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes** â€“ Number of heap bytes that are in use.
panels.title: Currrent bytes INUSE spans

panels.description: **go_memstats_heap_idle_bytes** â€“ Number of heap bytes waiting to be used.
panels.title: Currrent bytes in IDLE spans

panels.description: **go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes** minus **go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes** shows how many bytes of memory has been allocated for the heap, but not currently used.
panels.title: Memory allocated but not used

panels.description: **go_memstats_heap_idle_bytes** minus **go_memstats_heap_released_bytes** this is memory that the runtime retains in order to not require more from the OS , so avoid such costly operation.
panels.title: Memory that could be returned to OS

panels.description: **go_memstats_heap_released_bytes** â€“ Number of heap bytes released to OS.
panels.title: Returned bytes of IDLE spans to the OS

panels.description: **go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes in use by the stack allocator.
panels.title: Current in use bytes (stack spans)

panels.description: **go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes obtained from system for stack allocator.
panels.title: Stack memory obtained from OS

panels.description: **go_memstats_mcache_sys_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes used for mcache structures obtained from system.
panels.title: From OS mscache bytes

panels.description: **go_memstats_mspan_sys_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes used for mspan structures obtained from system.
panels.title: From OS mspan bytes

panels.description: **go_memstats_mspan_inuse_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes in use by mspan structures.
panels.title: In use mspan bytes

panels.description: **go_memstats_mcache_inuse_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes in use by mcache structures.
panels.title: mspan cache bytes

panels.description: **go_memstats_gc_sys_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes used for garbage collection system metadata.
panels.title: Current GC metadata bytes

panels.description: **go_memstats_buck_hash_sys_bytes** â€“ Number of bytes used by the profiling bucket hash table.
panels.title: Current bucket hash tables bytes
